javadoc:
General utility class that provides convenience methods
 to deal with Program objects.

methods.javadoc:
Programs will only be stored during testing and are maintained as weak references.
@param program The program that is being tracked (all programs during testing.
methods.name: addTrackedProgram
methods.comment: Programs will only be stored during testing and are maintained as weak references.

params.name: program
params.comment: The program that is being tracked (all programs during testing.

methods.javadoc:
Returns an iterator for all of the {@link Program} objects in the system, which is all created programs in any state that have not been garbage collected.

Note:The Iterator is backed by an unmodifiable set, so any attempts to modify the Iterator will throw an {@link UnsupportedOperationException}. @return an iterator for all of the programs in the system
methods.name: getSystemPrograms
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator for all of the Program objects in the system, which is all
 created programs in any state that have not been garbage collected.  
 
 Note:The Iterator is backed by an unmodifiable set, so any attempts to modify the
 Iterator will throw an UnsupportedOperationException.

return.comment: an iterator for all of the programs in the system

methods.name: getByteCodeString
methods.comment:
Get the bytes associated with the specified code unit cu 
 formatted as a string.  Bytes will be returned as 2-digit hex
 separated with a space.  Any undefined bytes will be represented by "??".

methods.javadoc:
Convert old function wrapped external pointers.  Migrate function to
 external function.
methods.name: convertFunctionWrappedExternalPointer
methods.comment:
Convert old function wrapped external pointers.  Migrate function to
 external function.

name: ProgramUtilities
comment:
General utility class that provides convenience methods
 to deal with Program objects.
